narrative.title: 10 Armata Italian 10Th Army - 1940Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Field Army deployed in North Africa during 1940Q4.
narrative.objectives: Offensive field army tasked with conquest of Egypt and advance on Suez Canal. Reality: disastrous failure culminating in Operation Compass disaster (Dec 1940 - Feb 1941).
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain (Cyrenaica) and rocky desert - mixed terrain favoring mechanized warfare

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Numerical superiority over British Western Desert Force (150,000 vs 36,000)
Air support from Regia Aeronautica (331 aircraft)

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain (Cyrenaica) and rocky desert - mixed terrain favoring mechanized warfare
